title: Wrapper of the GROMACS grompp module.

input_gro_path.description: Path to the input GROMACS structure GRO file.

input_top_zip_path.description: Path the input GROMACS topology TOP and ITP files in zip format.

output_tpr_path.description: Path to the output portable binary run file TPR.

input_cpt_path.description: Path to the input GROMACS checkpoint file CPT.

input_ndx_path.description: Path to the input GROMACS index files NDX.

input_mdp_path.description: Path of the input MDP file.

mdp.description: MDP options specification. (Used if *input_mdp_path* is None)

type.description: Default options for the mdp file. Valid values: minimization, nvt, npt, free, index

output_mdp_path.description: Path of the output MDP file.

output_top_path.description: Path the output topology TOP file.

gmx_path.description: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.

restart.description: [WF property] Do not execute if output files exist.

container_path.description: Path to the binary executable of your container.

container_volume_path.description: Path to an internal directory in the container.

container_working_dir.description: Path to the internal CWD in the container.

container_user_id.description: User number id to be mapped inside the container.

container_shell_path.description: Path to the binary executable of the container shell.
